#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define x getchar()
#define y putchar

typedef long long ll;

void read(int & n){
	n = 0;
	char ch = x; int sign = 1;
	while(ch < '0' || ch > '9')
	{ if(ch == '-') sign = -1; ch = x; }
	while(ch >= '0' && ch <='9'){
		n = (n*10)%MOD + ch -'0';
		ch = x;
	}
	n *= sign;
}

inline void out(int k) {
	int n=k,i=0;
	char ch[15];
	if(n<=0) {
		if(n==0) y('0');		
		else 	y('-');
		n=n*-1;
		}
	while(n>0) {
		ch[i]=(n%10)+'0';
		n=n/10;
		i++;
		}
	while(i>0) {
		y(ch[i-1]);
		i--;
		}
	y('\n');
	}

int main(){
	int t,n,max,p,Index;
	read(t);
	while(t--){
		max = 0;
		read(n);
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { read(p); if(max < p){ max = p; Index = i;} }
		out(Index);
	}
	return 0;
}
